channel.title: CVE Feed for HIWIN -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HIWIN -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-3382|2024-08-03T01:07:06.500Z -- hiwin -- hiwin%20robot%20system%20software
item.description: HIWIN Robot System Software version 3.3.21.9869 does not properly address the terminated command source. As a result, an attacker could craft code to disconnect HRSS and the controller and cause a denial-of-service condition.
